file_content.text: We'll get word to Tad and Samsin--let them know the stand-off has ended.
Why it had to end like this, I don't know.
I'll spend my life in a Republic lockup...long as I get to see my family....
Arrin!
Get back... stay with the hostages, you can slip away....
It's over, don't you see that? You can't even move. Someone, please, help him!
Some of you are medics, aren't you? Do what you can for him.
The Protectors will help.
That should help with the pain, but he needs immediate medical attention.
I'll do what I can.
Standard-issue first-aid kit. Might help with the pain, but not much else.
Here's a medpac.
Anyone here know their way around a blaster wound?
Hey, I'm no doctor.
I'm on it. Good thing he didn't torch our supplies.
This man held you hostage for days. Now you're worried he's going to die?
What's going on here?
I'm not a hostage, I'm his wife.
Unless you want to die with him, back away slowly and don't move again.
Get out of my way.
I know what he did was wrong, but he was just trying to save us. No one got hurt, see?
What about the Protectors? They aren't soldiers--those were civilians he killed!
He's with the Regulators. They betrayed everyone on Makeb!
My husband was trying to get seats on the ark for his family. That's all any of his men wanted. You would've done the same!
You could have come to the Republic, to the Protectors--done all this without violence. Who says we wouldn't evacuate the Regulators' families?
Why not just be honest?
And would you've let us come along? Would Shalim?
All of these people want to escape Makeb alive. They haven't put a gun to anyone's head to get there.
These people were innocent.
They had a choice! Our men didn't.
Your husband and his men killed innocent people. They deserve to die for what they've done.
Last warning, lady.
You killed the rest of my men... I'll die with them... but my family wasn't in on the plan.
No! We won't leave you behind!
Please, let him go with us! He'll surrender to the Republic, I swear it!
You and your husband can get on the ark, but he'll have to answer for what he's done.
You'll all be saved.
A ticket to jail, huh.... Sure you want to be a criminal's wife?
Better than being his widow. Thank you.
He's not leaving Makeb alive. As for the rest of you... the resistance will sort you out.
Justice first. [Kill the mercenary]
No! Please, don't kill him!
Arrin...
None of that. Go on, get out of here... time to go. For all of us.
It's all right, everyone. Just stay where you are. We'll get a head count and check your vitals.
You did the right thing with Captain Nikols. We appreciate it.
Stay back! I'll blast everyone in here, I swear it!
The Regulators are gone. We just want out.
I'll do what I can.
